# Mentoring Program

### Spring 2021

We are launching a new mentoring program for ISEE NAC members. We plan to create groups of 5 members that we recommend meet monthly via Zoom for the next year. We will initially provide groups with topics to discuss but then groups will become self-directed. Feedback will be solicited midway through the program. 

Please complete the following [this survey](https://forms.gle/b2ESwx7stdrRccw59){target="_blank"} to let us know your preferences if you would like to participate.
